Package hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.dto

Class ErrorDto

java.lang.Object
hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.dto.ErrorDto
public class ErrorDto extends Object
Data transfer object (DTO) representing an error response.

    • ErrorDto

      public ErrorDto(LocalDateTime timestamp, String message, String path, Map<String,String> errors)
      Constructs a new ErrorDto with the specified timestamp, message, path, and errors.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp when the error occurred.
      message - The error message.
      path - The URL path where the error occurred.
      errors - A map containing detailed error information (field name -> error message).
